content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/happy-hedgehog-free-crochet-pattern/ this snuggly fuzzy friend is made using flat panels which are then seamed together he fits in the palm of your hand so you could easily add a hanging loop and add him to the tree as an ornament because this pattern calls for three different weights of yarn you will need three different hook sizes 2 75mm 3 25mm 3 75mm
